attributes.title: Principles That Can Be Used As Conscious Currency In This Universe
attributes.description:
28 JUNE 2020  PARAMASHIVOHAM LEVEL 2 - SEASON 7 - DAY 5 

*THIS IS THE MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM PARAMASHIVA. I AM OPENING IT AS IT IS:

*TODAY I WANTED TO REVEAL CONSCIOUS PRINCIPLES DIRECTLY FROM PARAMASHIVA.

*THE CONSCIOUS PRINCIPLES I RECEIVED ABOUT CONSCIOUS CURRENCY:

*GOLD CAN BE USED AS A CURRENCY IN ANY COUNTRY. IF YOU HAVE GOLD, IN ANY COUNTRY YOU CAN GET YOUR FOOD, ACCOMMODATION OR BUY ANYTHING YOU WANT. GOLD IS THE COMMON CURRENCY ALMOST IN MANY COUNTRIES. 

*LIKE THAT, THERE ARE SOME COMMON PRINCIPLES IN THE WHOLE COSMOS. IF YOU HAVE THESE PRINCIPLES IN YOU, YOU CAN USE THOSE PRINCIPLES AS CURRENCY IN THE WHOLE COSMOS - IN ALL VERTICAL TIME ZONES IN THIS PLANET EARTH, IN THE HIGHER TIME ZONES, HIGHER PLANES.

*I WILL EXPLAIN WHAT IS CONSCIOUS PRINCIPLES. PATANJALI USES A BEAUTIFUL WORD सर्व भौम व्रताः “SARVA BHAUMA VRATAAHA”. IT MEANS, IN ALL PLACES, ZONES OF EXISTENCES, THESE PRINCIPLES WILL HAVE THEIR VALUE. 

*AHIMSA, SATYA, ASTEYA, APARIGRAHA. FIRST PRINCIPLE IS NONVIOLENCE. SECOND IS ABSOLUTE INTEGRITY WITH NATURE AND COSMOS.  THIRD - NON STEALING. NOT ONLY NOT ROBBING OTHERS’ PROPERTIES, BUT NOT TAKING AWAY LIFE OR LIVELIHOOD OF NATURAL INHABITANTS OF PLANET EARTH. TAKING LIFE AWAY FROM THEM FOR YOU EATING THEIR BODY IS STEALING. NO ONE CAN BELONG TO ANOTHER LIFE. IF SOMETHING IS EMPOWERED TO RUN AND SAVE ITSELF FROM YOU, YOU DON'T HAVE THE RIGHT TO KILL THEM AND EAT. 

*THAT IS WHY ANIMALS CANNOT BE USED AS FOOD. YOU CAN'T STEAL THEIR ORGANS OR THEIR BODY. THEIR LIFE FOR YOUR FOOD. 

*STEP BY STEP I WILL EXPLAIN THESE PRINCIPLES AND HOW THEY SAVE AND INTEGRATE YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS, HOW THEY CAN BE USED AS CONSCIOUS CURRENCY IN THIS UNIVERSE. 

*I WILL GIVE YOU ONE EXAMPLE: A VIOLENT MAN WASTES HIS CONTINUOUSLY EMBODIED LIFE PERIOD. PEOPLE WHO ARE VIOLENT AND ATTACKING ME, TRYING ASSASINATION ATTEMPTS, LAWFARE, EVERYTHING...WHO ARE USING YEARS OF LIFE FOR IT, I DON'T EVEN KNOW THEM. I AM SO BUSY LOVING THE PEOPLE WHO LOVE ME, I DON'T HAVE TIME TO HATE THE PEOPLE WHO HATE ME. THEY ARE WASTING THEIR DECADES HATING ME.

*PEOPLE WITH VIOLENCE, HATRED MENTAL SETUP, WASTE SOMETIMES NOT JUST NUMBER OF YEARS, BUT WHOLE LIFE GOING AFTER THEIR VIOLENCE AND ANGER. THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE TRYING TO PERSECUTE MAY WASTE THEIR WHOLE LIFE AND DIE IN THEIR VIOLENCE. THEN THEY TAKE NEXT BIRTH. THEY FORGET THEY WASTED THEIR WHOLE LIFE IN VIOLENCE, THEY WILL START HATING SOMEBODY ELSE BECAUSE THEY CARRY THAT VIOLENCE PATTERN. 

*I TELL YOU, VIOLENCE AND ANGER IS NEGATIVE CURRENCY CONSCIOUSLY. CONSCIOUS CURRENCY HAS ITS OWN LOGIC.

*ANYTHING WHICH EXCITES YOU, INSPIRES YOU, EMPOWERS YOU, IS CONSCIOUS CURRENCY. ANYTHING WHICH DRAINS YOU, PUTS YOU IN BLIND SPOT, IS NEGATIVE CURRENCY. VIOLENCE IS NEGATIVE CURRENCY. NON VIOLENCE IS POSITIVE CONSCIOUS CURRENCY.

*YOUR BRAIN IS BUILT BY CONSCIOUSNESS. DON'T THINK BRAIN BUILDS CONSCIOUSNESS. CONSCIOUSNESS BUILDS YOUR BRAIN. YOUR WHOLE BODY CAN BE BUILT BY CONSCIOUSNESS. CONSCIOUSNESS MANIFESTS AS BODY, BRAIN AND EVERYTHING. 

*THESE CONSCIOUS CURRENCIES WILL HELP IN ANY ZONE YOU REACH. A PERSON NONVIOLENT AND NON STEALING CAN LIVE AS LONG AS YOU WANT IN TAPO LOKA, WHERE ALL PEACEFUL PEOPLE EXIST. 

*IF YOU HAVE MASTERED LIVING WITH MINIMAL THINGS, APARIGRAHA, YOU CAN LIVE IN SWARGA LOKA. ANYBODY WHO LIVES IN APARIGRAHA, WITH THE CONSCIOUS PRINCIPLE OF NON-POSSESSIVENESS, IT MEANS YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS IS QUALIFIED TO LIVE IN SWARGA LOKA. 

*EACH OF THE TRUTH I AM UTTERING IS ABSOLUTE STRAIGHTFORWARD COSMIC LOGIC. I AM NOT TALKING SOMETHING WHICH YOU JUST NEED TO BELIEVE. IT IS EXPERIENTIAL COSMIC LOGIC. YOU CAN EXPERIMENT WITH WHAT I AM SAYING. YOU CAN SEE THE RESULT OF IT IN YOUR LIFE. CORONA IS LITERALLY MELTING THE WORLD DOWN. THE AGHORA PRINCIPLE OF PARAMASHIVA IS MANIFESTING. THE AGHORA TANDAVA IS HAPPENING. 

*ALL THE RELATIONSHIPS WHICH ARE THE SOCIAL CONTRACTS, ARE MELTING DOWN. ALL LEGAL AND MORAL CONTRACTS ARE MELTING DOWN. ONLY SPIRITUAL CONTRACTS WILL BE DELIVERED. ALL OTHER CONTRACTS ARE MELTING DOWN!

More at: www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4040610482693438
